title: Ndị Uweojii Anwụchiela Nwaafọ Nigeria na Mba India Maka Ọgwụike
sentences:
Izunna Okafor dere akụkọ a
Ngalaba ụlọọrụ uwe ojii pụrụ iche na-ahụ maka ihe gbasaara ọgwụike, bụ ‘Narcotics Squad’ nke West Delhi dị na mba India anwụchiela otu nwaafọ ala Nigeria maka itinye aka n'ihe gbasaara ịtụ mgbere ọgwụike
Nwoke ahụ, bụ Aboh Casmir Arinze bụ onye e kwuru na a nwụchikọrọ na nsonso a na maghara Janakpuri nke Delhi
Ozi a kụpụrụ site n'aka ụlọọrụ ahụ na-ekwukwa na e nwetere ọgwụike ‘heroin’ ruru gram narị atọ na abụọ (302 grams) n'aka ya, bụ nke ọnụ ego ya ruru Rs 1 crore

Ụlọọrụ ahụ gakwara n'ihu kwuo na ya bụ nwa amadi batara mba India n'ọnwa Septemba ahọ 2019 maka ihe nlekọta ahụike ya, mana ọ laghachizịghị ala Nigeria mgbe akwụkwọ e nyere ya gachara; kama ọ nọrọ ebe ahụ bido rebezie akwa, wee megidezie, banye n'ịtụ mgbere ọgwụike
Ka ọ dị taa, ndị uweojii ka na-emekwazị nnyocha banyere okwu ya, ma na-amakwa imi n'ala, iji nwụchikọọ ndị ọzọ ọ na-egote ọgwụike n'aka ha maọbụkwanụ ndị na-egoro n'aka nke ya
